Detailed Description

Implementation class of a surgical laparoscopic grasper.

This class, that inherits from vtkToolLaparascopy, defines a surgical grasper, inside the scenario.
Contains methods for position control of the tool in the scene and collision detection.
A laparoscopic grasper is composed of 3 elements:

  • Stick
  • 2 Levers.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

vtkToolGrasper::vtkToolGrasper ( ) [protected]

Reset tool to its initial position.

Initial position: * Tool z-axis orientation set to 0 * Both levers must be closed Retore tool to its last position

bool vtkScenarioObject::IsDisabled ( ) [inline, inherited]

Check if object is disabled.

When an object is disabled it will NOT:

  • be visible.
  • be computed in collision detection.
  • be used in simulation.
bool vtkScenarioObject::IsEnabled ( ) [inline, inherited]

Check if object is visible.

When an object is enabled it will:

  • be visible.
  • be computed in collision detection.
  • be used in simulation.

void vtkToolGrasper::SetOpening ( double  opening)

Set the tool's opening according with the value given in the "Opening" parameter.

This function set the tool's aperture in function of the value given in the "Opening" parameter. The opening is established modifying the tool's mesh position.

See also:
double GetOpening()

yy position of the object
zz position of the object

Member Data Documentation

double vtkToolGrasper::Opening [protected]

Grasper opening ratio.

The "Opening" parameter can take any value between "0" $ "1":

  • "0" -> to close the tool
  • "1" -> to open the tool
double vtkToolGrasper::OpeningAngle [protected]

Grasper opening angle.

Angle value is given in radians

vtkScenarioElement* vtkToolGrasper::Stick [protected]

Process the algorithm request (Update).

Stick element
